scripts.postinstall: grep -Fxq tmp .gitignore || echo 'tmp' >> .gitignore; git checkout gh-pages && grep -Fxq tmp .gitignore || echo 'tmp' >> .gitignore; git checkout master
scripts.test: cd src; jade -o '{ filename: "." }' -O ../tmp *jade; cd .. && cp -a assets tmp; npm run-script open-tmp; npm run-script install-google-verification
scripts.doc: git checkout gh-pages; cd .; rm -rf assets *html && mv tmp/* . && rm -r tmp && git add -A *html assets* && git commit -a -m 'regenerated docs'; git pull --rebase; echo file:///`pwd`/index.html; echo git checkout master
